Text: Thanks M00Dy, this torrent looks great. I went and bought 6 pairs of glasses as the local Blockbuster and the 3d effects were pretty funny. Best 3d you'll get without 2 Imax projectors in your living room. Red/Green glasses look great on a computer monitor.

6 pairs of 3d glasses?....$1.50
watching some dumb broad get her head knocked off by a Nascar Tire in 3D?...... priceless
